page.title: 10MANOR HOUSES
page.content: In our "D" block there are three {manor houses}.One in{Strethall, Strethall Hall,and two in{Littlebury {Green},Howe Hall and Elmdon Lee. Strethall Hall is owned by the Scott family.It is in the North part of the parish of Strethall. Howe Hall is in the East of Littlebury Green.In 1857,it was moved from Howe wood in Catmere End.Nobody lives there at the moment,but it is owned by Audley End estate.The house is in the parish of Littlebury Green. Elmdon Lee dates back to the 16th century,and is owned by the Duke family.The house is just outside Littlebury Green to the West of our "D" block,and is in the parish of Strethall.The family also own a shop next to the house,which sells arts and crafts.
